entry.title: “Will God Punish Me for an Insincere Prayer?“ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210026)

media:group.media:title: “Will God Punish Me for an Insincere Prayer?“ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210026)
media:group.media:description:
What will happen if I don't mean what I say when I pray? Will God punish me for an insincere prayer? Find out the answer to this question—and many others—on 3ABN Today Bible Q & A with Greg and Jill Morikone, Jason Bradley, and Ryan Day.
Send us your Bible Questions! By email: BibleQA@3abn.org By text: (618) 228-3975
TDYQA210026 #Bibletopics

entry.title: “The Restless Prophet” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 12 Q3 2021

media:group.media:title: “The Restless Prophet” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 12 Q3 2021
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2021 quarter 3, lesson 12 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is “Rest in Christ” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “The Restless Prophet” Join us every week for a fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Jonah 1–4, Jer. 25:5, Ezek. 14:6, Rev. 2:5, Luke 9:51–56, Jude 1–25
“ ‘And should I not pity Nineveh, that great city, in which are more than one hundred and twenty thousand persons who cannot discern between their right hand and their left—and much livestock?’ ” (Jonah 4:11, NKJV).
(September 11–September 17)
Sunday (Kenny Shelton) - “Running Away” Monday (Jill Morikone) - “A Three-Day Rest” Tuesday (Jason Bradley) - “Mission Accomplished” Wednesday (John Lomacang) - “An Angry, Restless Missionary” Thursday (Shelley Quinn) - “A Two-Way Street”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2021:3Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ321_12.pdf

media:group.media:title: “A Sure Pathway to Health” - 3ABN Today (TDY210047)
media:group.media:description:
In a world being bombarded with disease and illnesses of every kind, there is hope! God has provided a pathway to health that brings stability and prevention even during the pandemic. Join Ryan Day and special guest Lucia Tiffany as they discuss ways you can strengthen your health during these times of uncertainty.
Learn more: https://luciatiffany.com/

entry.title: “Is the Secret Rapture Real?“ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210025)

media:group.media:title: “Is the Secret Rapture Real?“ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210025)
media:group.media:description:

media:group.media:description:

This quarter's book topic is “Rest in Christ” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Longing for More” Join us every week for a fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
1 Cor. 10:1–11, Lev. 4:32–35, John 1:29, Heb. 4:1–11, Ps. 95:8–11
“Now these things took place as examples for us, that we might not desire evil as they did” (1 Cor. 10:6, ESV).

media:group.media:title: “Grow the Population of Heaven” - 3ABN Today (TDY210044)
media:group.media:description:
We can still be about our Father’s business even when it’s tough. In fact, now more than ever! This is the last opportunity we have to grow the population of Heaven! Our target should be the darkest places on earth. Hear about what God is doing through the amazing ministry of Jesus for Asia. Hosted by Greg Morikone. Guests: Jon Wood, President, Jesus for Asia; Natalie Wood, Co-Founder, Jesus for Asia.
Learn more: https://jesus4asia.org/

entry.title: “God Defends My Cause” - 3ABN Today Family Worship (TDYFW210029)

media:group.media:title: “God Defends My Cause” - 3ABN Today Family Worship (TDYFW210029)
media:group.media:description:
Join your 3ABN family around the table for the encouraging discussion of God’s promises to plead our cases and defend our cause. God answers His people’s prayers for salvation, justice, and vengeance. Christ is our Guarantor of the everlasting covenant—He will complete His good work in our hearts and vindicate us against the accusations of our adversary, the devil. Hosted by JD & Shelley Quinn. Guests: Dee Hilderbrand and Donald Owen.

entry.title: Plug in to God's "Rhema" Word Power | Sermon by Shelley Quinn

media:group.media:title: Plug in to God's "Rhema" Word Power | Sermon by Shelley Quinn
media:group.media:description:
In this sermon produced by 3ABN, Shelley Quinn will share from the Bible eight benefits of plugging in to Rhema word power. Learn how to wield the “sword of the Spirit,” increase your faith, and increase the effectiveness of your prayers.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

media:group.media:title: “Sabbath Rest” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 10 Q3 2021
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2021 quarter 3, lesson 10 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is “Rest in Christ” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Sabbath Rest” Join us every week for a fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Gen. 1:26, 27; Gen. 9:6; 2 Pet. 2:19; Rom. 6:1–7; Exod. 19:6; John 5:7–16
“Six days shall work be done, but the seventh day is a Sabbath of solemn rest, a holy convocation. You shall do no work on it; it is the Sabbath of the Lord in all your dwellings” (Lev. 23:3, NKJV).
(August 28–September 3)
Sunday (John Dinzey) - “Sabbath and Creation” Monday (John Lomacang) - “Celebrating Freedom” Tuesday (Shelley Quinn) - “The Stranger in Your Gates” Wednesday (Ryan Day) - “Serving Others Honors God's Sabbath” Thursday (Jill Morikone) - “The Sign That We Belong to God”
